about_the_game:
Welcome to the beyond.frontiers demo, an exciting preview of the full game! While this demo offers a rich experience in open-world space exploration and combat, it comes with a few limitations to look forward to in the complete version.

  • No Story Missions: While you can freely explore the universe, the demo does not include the main story missions featured in the full game.
  • No Jump Hole Exploration: Discoverable systems through hidden jump holes are disabled in the demo.
  • Level Cap of 15: You can progress up to level 15, offering a glimpse of early-game progression and mechanics.
  • No Multiplayer nor Dedicated Server Program Added: Multiplayer features and the dedicated server program are not available in the demo.

Your journey begins here, but the full galaxy with its mysteries and epic narrative still lies beyond the horizon. Jump in and experience what beyond.frontiers has to offer!


In beyond.frontiers, you take on the role of an intrepid explorer, venturing into the unknown expanses of the universe. Navigate beyond the boundaries of three mighty empires, uncover hidden systems, and encounter both allies and adversaries. Whether you're engaging in fierce battles, trading rare resources, or simply exploring the uncharted reaches of space, your decisions will help shape the future of the galaxy.

This Demo version offers a glimpse into the full game, with access to developer builds so you can follow the progress as we continue to improve the game. Some features are limited in the demo, including no story missions, no multiplayer or dedicated server program, no jump hole exploration, and a level cap of 15. However, you can still enjoy a rich sampling of the gameplay. We encourage you to wishlist the main game after experiencing the demo!


The demo of beyond.frontiers showcases a variety of features, including:

  • Full Moddability
  • Test 9 of the 25 space ships in the game
  • Multiverse Chat and Events
  • Open, dynamic universe with many of the over100 sectors to explore (sector count reduced in demo)
  • Fully voiced NPCs and immersive characters
  • Dynamic trade system based on supply and demand
and much, much more—ready to be discovered in the full game.


Even in the demo, you'll have access to a range of ships, from versatile all-rounders like the Starlight, Mining Vessels like the Cobalt and Traders like the Demeter. Whether you're piloting massive battleships bristling with defensive turrets or exploring new horizons in sleek explorer craft, there's a ship for every playstyle. Shield yourself from radiation, mine rare materials, salvage from battlefield wreckages—it’s all up to you in the full version of beyond.frontiers.


Align yourself with one of the three main factions that rule the known frontier regions:
  • The hypercapitalistic Terrans, where wealth and income reign supreme. Amass your fortune through trade or defend your holdings from relentless pirates.
  • The liberal-democratic Sirians, where freedom is everything. Manage their contested borders and navigate forgotten routes, building alliances along the way.
  • The meritocratic Orionics, an independent colony thriving on knowledge, innovation, and progress.
Your loyalty and choices within these factions will determine your path through the stars.


While the Demo doesn’t feature the full storyline, the full game will offer over 20 hours of fully voiced campaigns. Whether you follow the footsteps of the immortal Wanderer, James P. Burnard (voiced by Twitch streamer Pelikano), lead your faction to new frontiers, or unravel a century-old mystery, there’s an unforgettable story waiting for you.

Even outside of the main campaign, stations will soon offer smaller, dynamically generated missions for mining, combat, and defense, as well as rumors that can spark hidden events. Though these aspects are limited in the demo, you'll still get a taste of the universe's dynamic mission system.

We’re excited to have you experience the frontier in this preview demo. Embark on your journey today and wishlist the full game for the complete adventure upon release!

short_description: beyond.frontiers is a vast space exploration game. Pilot over 20 ships across 125+ handcrafted and procedural sectors. Customize the game with extensive modding, and dive into fully voiced storylines. Explore, trade, or fight—endless adventures await in the expansive universe of Beyond.Frontiers.
